mapper.insert:
insert into expedia_images (hotel_id, hero_image, group_en, `group`, category_id, category_en, caption, small_size_url, large_size_url) values
(#{item.hotelId},#{item.heroImage},#{item.groupEn},#{item.group},#{item.categoryId}, #{item.categoryEn},#{item.caption},#{item.smallSizeUrl},#{item.largeSizeUrl})
